sentences.sContent: His successor died after only 15 months in office.
sentences.sCn: 他的继任者就任仅15个月就去世了。

sentences.sContent: I’m sure she will be a worthy successor (= someone who is very good and deserves to be someone’s successor ) .
sentences.sCn: 我确信她会是个当之无愧的接班人。

phrases.pCn: 法定继承人；合法继承人

remMethod.val: 来自success (接替) + or → 继承人， 继任者

words.tran: 连续的；继承的；依次的；接替的
成功，成就；胜利；大获成功的人或事物

trans.tranOther: someone who takes a job or position previously held by someone else
